last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: A year after the chaos involving the gods and the sanctuary, much has changed and Orphen continues on his journey across the world.

name: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen
original_name: 魔術士オーフェンはぐれ旅
overview: Orphen is a powerful sorcerer who is notoriously lazy. Everything changes when he finds a way to save his sis, who was turned into a dragon during their days at magic academy. Betrayed by friends who refused to help, Orphen will stop at nothing to track her down, even if he has to go it alone.

episodes.name: A Vestige of the Past
episodes.overview: Orphen is searching for his friend Azalie after she had disappeared five years ago. He’s currently trying to pay off his debt at the inn he’s staying at when two dwarves named Volkan and Dortin tell him they have a sweet plan to get him out of debt.

episodes.name: The Tower of Fangs
episodes.overview: Orphen, Volkan, and Dortin are captured by the authorities after the fiasco with the monster that appeared. Orphen is then summoned by Heartia to go talk to his former master, Childman.

episodes.name: Heed My Call, Beast
episodes.overview: Orphen goes with Childman and the other Black Sorcerers in order to try to track down Azalie before they can kill her. He manages to track down the creature, and despite his best efforts to talk to her, the creature attacks.

episodes.name: The Chaos Witch and the Successor of the Razor’s Edge
episodes.overview: Orphen remembers more of his past at the Tower of Fangs and a time when he and Azalie ventured back to the orphanage where they grew up. Back in present time, Orphen finds a couple of stowaways…

episodes.name: Deep Dragon
episodes.overview: Orphen, Claiomh, and Majic try to get through Fenrir’s Forest to get to Tafrem. However, Majic ends up lost in the forest and runs into a mysterious girl.

episodes.name: Forest Maiden
episodes.overview: After Orphen is attacked by the Deep Dragon, he wakes up in a cell unsure of where he is or who he is for a moment. A girl then appears before him, and offers to heal his wounds and eventually, his memories return.

episodes.name: Gather In My Forest, Wolves
episodes.overview: Orphen tries to stop MacDougal from going into the Dragon’s sanctuary. The Deep Dragon attacks the village for attempting to go into the Dragon’s sanctuary and Orphen tries to save the villagers.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Assassin
episodes.overview: An assassin is killing one elder after another. Forte and Leticia try to find out who’s behind the murders. Meanwhile, the assassin shows himself before Orphen and he’s shocked to see that they have the same face as him.

episodes.name: Ghost from the Past
episodes.overview: Leticia and Orphen try to figure out who the assassin actually is. Is Orphen who he thinks he is, or is the assassin calling himself Krylancelo his true self?

episodes.name: Make My Past Disappear, Assassin
episodes.overview: Claiomh is kidnapped by the assassin, and Orphen faces off with the assassin that calls himself Krylancelo once and for all in order to save her.

episodes.name: The Uoar Class
episodes.overview: Claiomh tries to cook some food to nurse Orphen back to health, but it might be doing more harm than good. Orphen and Leticia take Majic to the Tower of Fangs so he can enroll.

episodes.name: Death Keening
episodes.overview: Tish ends up following one of the assassins so that Orphen wouldn’t have to deal with them and ends up getting hurt. Orphen plans to get revenge, but gets help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Come to My Tower, Successor
episodes.overview: Orphen, Claiomh, and Majic head to the Tower of Fangs to settle things with the Uoar Class once and for all!

episodes.name: Say My Will, Demon King
episodes.overview: Orphen, Majic, and Claiomh continue their journey to Kimluck when they stumble upon an eerie theater that wasn’t on their map.

episodes.name: His Own Angel and Devil
episodes.overview: Orphen and his friends unexpectedly end up seeing the “Demon King” play after heading down into the underground theater.

episodes.name: The City That Rejects Sorcerers
episodes.overview: Orphen and Amick head to Kimluck and Orphen finds out more about the Death Instructors.

episodes.name: Sister Istersiva
episodes.overview: Orphen finds an unlikely ally who’s willing to help him get into the center of Kimluck.

episodes.name: Shed Bloody Tears, Holy City
episodes.overview: Orphen encounters an unexpected enemy in the underground passage leading to the cathedral.

episodes.name: We of Holy Death
episodes.overview: Orphen and Majic continue through the underground passage to try to find an exit. Claiomh is still mysteriously unconscious.

episodes.name: That Sorcery Will Kill Him
episodes.overview:
Orphen finds out that Magic is out of control of magic and bans the use of magic. However, Magick makes Orphen, who treats himself half-serving, frustrated. When the party left the underpass, there was a prison where Sarua was captured.

When he breaks the prison with Sarua, the pursuit approaches immediately behind him. It was Orphen who quickly composed magic, but that magic is ...

episodes.name: The Hall of the Great Poet
episodes.overview: Orphen, Majic, Claiomh, and Salua continue to head up into the Cathedral and end up having to battle Quo.

episodes.name: The Death Instructors
episodes.overview: Azalie gives Claiomh something that transports her, Majic, and Salua out of danger. Meanwhile, Quo discovers the unexpected truth.

episodes.name: The Only Thing That Can Kill Her
episodes.overview: Orphen and Azalie have a conversation to try to mend their past and they find out Ramonirok's true identity.

episodes.name: Draw Your Bow at My God, Apostate
episodes.overview: The battle with Quo draws to a close. Will Orphen be victorious?

episodes.name: Sink into My Dreams, Paradise
episodes.overview: After the battle at the Kimluck Church Cathedral, Orphen and his party decide to relax and get some rest at the Ledgeborne Hot Spring Village. But on their way there, Orphen loses his bag with all of their money in it and the party ends up working at Eris and Sheena's inn so they can also stay there. That is when Orphen and his party get dragged into the dark side of the hot spring village. The secret behind the hot springs, the Lotz Group pressuring the surrounding inns... and there were also incidents where tourists had gone missing.

episodes.name: The Ghosts of the Execution Grounds
episodes.overview: A mysterious beast decapitates Volkan as he's wandering around the forest. Orphen investigates the forest with Dortin, who's convinced his brother is dead, and they find a Celestial ruin.

episodes.name: Guide My Fate, Magic Blade
episodes.overview: Claiomh and Leki cross paths with a mysterious swordsman named Ryan Spoon, who introduces them to his master, Lottecia Crewbstar.

episodes.name: The Sword Princess of Nashwater
episodes.overview: Orphen is asked by Claiomh to find out why two of the swordsmanship dojos in town are in conflict with each other. The reason appears to be that Lottecia and Ed were fighting over Lottecia's late father's sword, Freak Diamond.

episodes.name: The Crest of the Insects Sword
episodes.overview: Ed and Lottecia face off to determine the fate of the Crest of Insects Sword! But meanwhile, what is the terrible truth Claiomh is about to learn about the man called Ryan Spoon?

episodes.name: Lay Claim to My Heart, Devil
episodes.overview: Orphen realizes who Ed actually is and also teaches Lottecia what it's like to fight in the real world.

episodes.name: Shine Down Upon My Ambush, Moonlight
episodes.overview: Claiomh and Majic return to the inn and are attacked by Ryan and Helpart. Ryan captures Claiomh, and Helpart overpowers Majic using the sword Freak Diamond. Meanwhile, Orphen finds Lottecia and tracks her down, but it was a trap. Lottecia led Orphen to somewhere secluded so she could ambush him!

episodes.name: The Green Gem Armor
episodes.overview: Ryan Spoon wants to show Claiomh true despair.

episodes.name: The Messenger from the Imminent Domain
episodes.overview: Helpart confronts Corgon with a life on the line while Orphen find his path has crossed with another mysterious acquaintance once more.

episodes.name: The Melancholy of the Red Dragon
episodes.overview: Ryan Spoon and Helpart make the next move in their plan.

episodes.name: The Most Powerful White Sorcerer
episodes.overview: Orphen fights against Halpart in order to save Claiomh and understand Corgon's motivations.

episodes.name: Engulf My Despair, Verdure
episodes.overview: Orphen has is final showdown with Ryan Spoon!

episodes.name: Dance Across My Battlefield, Visitors
episodes.overview: Orphen and his party head for the Imminent Domain. Along the way, Orphen is reunited with someone from his past, and a dwarven legend threatens the party's progress.

episodes.name: Childman Network
episodes.overview: Orphen and his party team up with a team of Sorcerers from the capital to combat the army of dwarven ghosts. Meanwhile, Majic frantically searches for Claiomh, accosted at every step by ghostly echoes of his companions.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Seek and Kakorkist split off from the rest of the group to pursue a hidden agenda. Orphen and Winona form an uneasy alliance while the rest of the party struggles to withstand the influence of the network.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Igritte fights with all her remaining strength and delivers a message. Leticia faces Seek and Kakorkist while Orphen and Winona investigate the lord's mansion.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Orphen suspects foul play when Claiomh and Majic act out of character. Orphen and Lottecia try to determine who the true enemy is.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Orphen learns the true nature of the lord of the Imminent Domain. Majic considers what he wants out of a teacher and as a Sorcerer. Meanwhile, Lottecia encounters Corgon and is forced to consider uncomfortable things about her past.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Orphen assembles the reunited party and heads to the sanctuary to investigate the Second World-Seeing Tower where Azalie will allegedly be returning to the continent. However, they are accosted by agents of the Thirteen Apostles block their path.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Thirteen Apostles plan their next move while the Dragons finalize their plans to leave the continent behind. Leticia infiltrates the sanctuary to negotiate for humanity.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The priests in control of the sanctuary reveal the fate of the Dragons. Corgon positions himself to attempt to take control of the sanctuary. Meanwhile, Orphen and the others attempt to break through the barrier protecting the sanctuary.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Claiomh, Leki, and several of the Thirteen Apostles suddenly disappear. Orphen faces Jack Frisbee head-on before trying to pass through the barrier protecting the sanctuary.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Friends, enemies, and lovers are reunited for a massive confrontation at the Second World-Seeing Tower. The fate of the continent is decided as two Sorcerers contend for the Demon King's power.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A year after the chaos involving the gods and the sanctuary, much has changed and Orphen continues on his journey across the world.
